Package controller

Class AddUpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddUpdateCustomerController
public class AddUpdateCustomerController extends Object
Controls the behavior of the AddUpdateCustomer.fxml scene. Provides functionality to either add new Customer or modify existing Customer, based on user input to the displayed form.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the form with existing data if Customer has been selected and modify button clicked on mainForm.

    • setModifiedCust

      public static void setModifiedCust(Customer customer)
      Sets modifiedCust variable to selected Customer to be modified from the mainForm controller.
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer to set

    • onCustCancel

      public void onCustCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Changes the current scene back to the MainForm.fxml. lambda expression used here to change current scene to MainForm.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • onCustSave

      public void onCustSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      New or updated Customer is either saved to database or an error message is displayed for user to correct. Checks to verify all combobox selections have been made. lambda expression used here to change current scene to MainForm.fxml upon successful save.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • getUniqueId

      public static int getUniqueId()
      Iterates through integers with while loop starting at 1 and compares to existing Customer_IDs to find unused integer for Customer_ID
      Returns:
      the first unused integer found.

    • setDivisions

      public void setDivisions()
      options in the custStateBox combobox are set depending on user selection of the Country combobox.

    • setDivId

      public void setDivId()
      calls getDivIdFromName to get divId from first_level_division name selected by user in the custStateBox
